paper_abstract: We prove a Chernoff-like large deviation bound on the sum of non-independent random variables that have the following dependence structure. The variables Y1,...,Yr are arbitrary [0,1]-valued functions of independent random variables X1,...,Xm, modulo a restriction that every X-i influences at most k of the variables Y1,...,Yr. (c) 2014 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Random Struct. Alg., 47, 99-108, 2015
paper_title: A tail bound for read-k families of functions
